caseTitle: Jameel Qadir v. Government of Balochistan Local Government Rural Development and Agrovilles Department, Quetta through its Secretary
tagline: Discussion: (1) Writ Jurisdiction of High Court in election disputes. (2) Expression “Coram non judice”. (3) Doctrine of ‘per incuriam’ (4) Doctrine of “functus officio”. (5) Section 37, 38, 39 & 41 of Balochistan Local Government Act, 2010. (6) Section 139 & 140 of Elections Act 2017. Rule 63(3), 72, 74, 78 & 80 of Balochistan Local Government (Election) Rules, 2013.
